response.overview: Michishige Sayumi's "SAYUMINGLANDOLL ~Rebirth~" concluded last year with great success.  The second installment of the series, a year after the previous one, is now available on Blu-ray Disc, recording "SAYUMINGLANDOLL ~Fate~," which began in March 2018, and is now available for general release!  The performance took place at COTTON CLUB in Marunouchi, Tokyo.  It's a performance that's neither a "concert," "musical," nor "dinner show," but rather an approximately 80-minute show that weaves together sound, light, and video  . This recording captures the performance on Monday, April 16, 2018.
response.title: SAYUMINGLANDOLL~宿命~
